snippet.title: The blue book of grammar and punctuation : an easy-to-use guide with clear rules, real-world examples, and reproducible quizzes
snippet.description: The blue book of grammar and punctuation : an easy-to-use guide with clear rules, real-world examples, and reproducible quizzes . \- 11th ed. / Straus, Jane A revised and updated new edition of the bestselling workbook and grammar guide The Blue Book of Grammar and Punctuation is a concise, entertaining workbook and guide to English grammar, punctuation, and usage [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2014. - 226 p.

snippet.title: Improve your English : the essential guide to English grammar, punctuation and spelling
snippet.description: Improve your English : the essential guide to English grammar, punctuation and spelling / Astle, JE Metcalfe & C It's important in our daily lives for us to write clear English which is easily understood [...] New York, NY : Constable & Robinson, 2013. - 457 p.

snippet.title: Dragon NaturallySpeaking for dummies
snippet.description: Dragon NaturallySpeaking for dummies . \- 3rd ed. / Diamond, Stephanie Learn to speak Dragon with For Dummies! Fully updated for the latest speech recognition tools and features, this bestselling guide helps you conquer Dragon NaturallySpeaking and gets you started creating documents, sending e-mail, searching the web, and more using only your voice [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2013. - 387 p.

snippet.title: Constructive communication
snippet.description: Constructive communication / Ellis, Richard Richard Ellis is a consultant in communications and the successful author of 'Communication for Engineers' [...] Hoboken, NJ : Taylor and Francis, 2012. - 209 p.

snippet.title: Take control : the Mac OS X lexicon
snippet.description: Take control : the Mac OS X lexicon / Zardetto, Sharon This ebook explains a little bit of everything; in fact, it's The Mac OS X (and then some) Lexicon because it's never just you and your Mac [...] Sebastopol : TidBITS, 2009. - 851 p.

snippet.title: Cambridge checkpoint English revision guide for the Cambridge secondary 1 test
snippet.description: Cambridge checkpoint English revision guide for the Cambridge secondary 1 test / Reynolds, John With Checkpoint English Revision Guide for the Cambridge Secondary 1 test you can aim for the best grade with the help of relevant and accessible notes, examiner advice plus questions and answers on each key topic. [...] London : Hodder Education, 2013. - 96 p.

snippet.description: The elements of Internet style : the new rules of creating valuable content for today's readers Learn the rules of today's tech-driven publishing landscape! snippet.title: English Grammar For Dummies
snippet.description: English Grammar For Dummies / Ward, Lesley J If you're confused by commas, perplexed by pronouns, and plain terrified by tenses, English Grammar For Dummies will put your fears to rest [...] Chichester : John Wiley & Sons, Inc, 2009. - 601 p.
